attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We did not ask to  become ill. And some of us have to live on gov. handouts and do not have the resorces to finanaly to pay a mortgage every month.This is taken away from us at the outset of becoming ill.

rejection.details: Please reword to make clear what you want the Prime Minister to do. Also, do you mean financially?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
